column4: i'm having issues getting update-grub2 to pick up my windows xp installation. it's a brand new install of both (installed xp, then karmic). i suspect it might be because ubuntu is on /dev/sda1 and windows xp is on /dev/sdb1, but i'm not sure if that matters or not...
yeah, both update-grub and update-grub2 both just list my linux partitions + memtest (which is all that gets written to /boot/grub/grub.cfg )
